translation.join_waitlist_party_size_error: Sorry, we only support party up to {{max}} people.
translation.waiting_body: We will inform you when your table is ready!
translation.waiting_checkin_body: We are ready to serve you, you simply need to check in.
translation.waiting_post_checkin: Please direct yourself to the accueil
translation.cancellation_body: By cancelling, you will lose your position in the waitlist. Are you sure?
translation.checked_in_instruction: You can now go to the entrance to be seated. Enjoy your time with us!
translation.checked_in_redirect: You will be redirected in {{remainingSeconds}} seconds.
translation.error: Something went wrong, we are sorry for the inconvenience.
translation.error_redirect: You will be redirected in {{remainingSeconds}} seconds.
